item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

NEW--NEW---NEW Saturday, MARCH 20, at ANGELICA’S, 49 South Main St., Middleton.
Rte. 114 between Rte. 1 and Rte. 495. (978)750-4900.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres 9-10.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Complimentary snacks, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
www.se-4u.com.
Hundreds of singles and couples, 35-60 years old.
FREE FOX TROT DANCE LESSON, 7:30-8:30.
Cost is $12 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress required, sports jacket, or tie, for men highly recommended; business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE
